thread.title_full: Wallaby Dan Vickerman was to speak about life after sport | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephen Johnson
title: Wallaby Dan Vickerman was to speak about life after sport | Daily Mail Online
text: Wallaby legend Dan Vickerman was tragically due to speak at event about the challenges facing athletes in retirement - before he took his own life late at night Former Wallaby great Dan Vickerman died aged 37 on Saturday night He was due to speak at a rugby players'forum on Saturday on life after sport Was found in family home and leaves behind a wife, Sarah, and two young girls Former rugby teammates revealed that he struggled with retirement Vickerman was one of Australia's greatest locks and played in 63 test games Published: 14:38 GMT, 20 February 2017 | Updated: 15:03 GMT, 20 February 2017 59 shares
